CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 090455-090855 
FROM DVC-30SW PUB-30ENE FTI-30WSW FTI-50WNW RSK-DVC 
WST ISSUANCES POSS ERY IN PD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS 
FROM STORM PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL 
DETAILS.
==

WSUS31 KKCI 090255 
SIGE  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET...NONE 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 090455-090855 
TS ARE NOT EXPD.
==

WSUS03 KKCI 090138 
CHIU WS 090138 
SIGMET UNIFORM 4 VALID UNTIL 090538 
SIGMET  
KS OK TX CO AZ NM 
FROM PUB TO GCK TO AMA TO ELP TO 50S TUS TO PUB 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL240 AND FL390. RPTD BY ACFT. CONDS SHIFTING 
SOUTHEASTWARD. CONDS CONTG BYD 0538Z.
==

WSUS04 KKCI 090126 
DFWV WS 090126 
SIGMET VICTOR 4 VALID UNTIL 090525 
SIGMET  
OK TX AR KS MO 
FROM 30S MCI TO 40NE ARG TO LIT TO AMA TO GCK TO 30S MCI 
OCNL SEV TURB BTN FL390 AND FL450. DUE TO WNDSHR ASSOCD WITH 
JTST. RPTD BY LJ60 NEAR OSW. CONDS ENDG 0525Z.
==

JTST. RPTD BY LJ60 NEAR OSW. CONDS ENDG 0525Z.
